column4: I know this is not the appropriate channel to ask this, but I do not know where else to do it. Anyone knows of an emulator to check if a usb drive made bootable works without restarting the computer?
not sure but qemu / virtualbox or vmware could help
thanks, that was the one I was looking for, but I couldnt remember the name
i know for fact that virtualbox binary release allow using usb as "raw" device
